glsa.title: Chicken: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Chicken, the worst of which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

background.p: Chicken is a scheme interpreter and native scheme to C compiler.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Chicken. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, or cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Chicken users should upgrade to the latest version:
